metadata.title: MODERN-TWIST Meal Set, Bowl & Lid, Hedgehog Family – Blue, 13 fl oz.
features: PRODUCT SPECS & FEATURES – This 100% food-grade silicone, water-proof Meal Set includes one bowl and one lid that doubles as a plate; Measures at 5”x 5” x 2” and holds 13 fl oz.; Heat resistant up to 425 degrees F, freezer safe; Family friendly designs
SAFE FOR PEOPLE AND OUR PLANET – Our 100% silicone products are plastic-free and contain ZERO BPAs, PVCs, lead, latex and phthalates

MODERN DESIGN, SOFT TO THE TOUCH– Our mealtime, mix-and-match meal set collection coordinates perfectly with our cup, bib and bowl products; Simplify lunch or snack time with these soft-touch bowls and make plastic a thing of the past

A GREAT GIFT IDEA – We work with independent artists to create sustainable gifts for home and entertaining; These beautifully decorated, eco-friendly products will be a welcome sight to any home décor/fashionista in your life
DISHWASHER SAFE AND EASY TO CLEAN – Toss our products in the dishwasher, or simply wipe it with hot water and soap in the sink; The cleaning process is seamless
description: We at modern-twist work with independent artists to create beautiful, functional homeware with a style to suit any aesthetic. Add a pop of color to your table, or perfectly complement your neutral-toned kitchen. Our stylish, practical products are made from plastic-free silicone for a hassle-free, easy clean up—Leaving you free to enjoy the designs and rich colors for many years to come.
